Organics:
 
The femme slid back and sat down, slowly stretching out her injured leg.  She was thankful for Windlord checking her injuries, but she needed to get to base soon.  
"Just patch my knee.  I'll manage until we get to base.  Are you sure you can carry her by yourself?"

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Windlord/Sedna:

Windlord took Nighlgith and kindle he left her in floor. Regarding 
that she was deeply sleep, Windlord could check Organics. 

"Sit down,"sdais the male while he help her and he proceed to chek 
and do some basics reparations"It may hurt, Organics, but it will 
help while we arrive to base"

> Organics:

of mech fluid from damaged fluid lines.  She struggled to keep from 
dropping Nightlight.

<DIV>The femme slid back and sat down, slowly stretching out her injured leg.  She was thankful for Windlord checking her injuries, but she needed to get to base soon.  </DIV>
